item.title: Naples, Italy: A Popular Tourist Destination Suffering from Violence and Unemployment
item.description: The southern Italian city has become fashionable for tourists, models and actors in a social media age. Yet it remains merciless for many of its youth...

item.title: New Orleans Attack on New Year’s Turns Celebration Into Terror
item.description: The attack that left 15 dead and about three dozen injured followed a distressingly familiar pattern of assailants turning vehicles into weapons.

item.title: Montenegro Shooting Kills 12, Including 2 Children, Officials Say
item.description: The authorities in the small Balkan country reported after a search that the gunman, whose rampage followed a bar fight, had been found dead.

item.title: New Orleans Attack ‘Inspired by ISIS’, and a Cybertruck Explosion in Las Vegas
item.description: Plus, a breathalyzer test for marijuana?
